content:
The document provides an overview of dynamic obstacles in PandAI, including how to add them using `addDynamicObstacle(NodePath obstacle)`, references a YouTube tutorial video, provides code examples (`dynamic-obstacles.py`), and offers a downloadable demo. This chunk is part of the Pathfinding documentation for PandAI.

Dynamic Obstacles

DYNAMIC OBSTACLES:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8BZ_3gua5Bs

In PandAI, use it via:

addDynamicObstacle(NodePath obstacle);

The code for this tutorial:

dynamic-obstacles.py

The full working demo can be downloaded at:

https://sites.google.com/site/etcpandai/documentation/pathfinding/DynamicObstacleDemo.zip?attredirects=0&d=1
